body_html:
when I use multi layer lstm,
if I put the lstm variables in gpu:0, it works well .
but when I change the lstm variable to gpu:1 or gpu:2,
error:
tensorflow.python.framework.errors.FailedPreconditionError: Attempting to use uninitialized value RNN/MultiRNNCell/Cell0/LSTMCell/W_0

body:
when I use multi layer lstm, 
if I put the lstm variables in gpu:0, it works well . 
but when I change the lstm variable to gpu:1 or gpu:2,  
error:
tensorflow.python.framework.errors.FailedPreconditionError: Attempting to use uninitialized value RNN/MultiRNNCell/Cell0/LSTMCell/W_0
